snippet: While it’s an open question whether jurors think Roger Clemens used performance-enhancing substances, his wife described in court how she took human growth home in their posh master bathroom.
lead_paragraph: While it’s an open question whether jurors think Roger Clemens used performance-enhancing substances, his wife described in court how she took human growth home in their posh master bathroom.

headline.seo: Roger Clemens’ Wife Testifies She Took Human Growth Hormone
headline.main: Roger Clemens’ Wife Testifies She Took Human Growth Hormone
